channel.title: special on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in special on Rusland 1

item.title: Best from Belarus: music from White Russia
item.description: In the selection of Belarusian music, Би-2 , Molchat Doma , and Грязь are absent due to prior coverage. Brutto Also see Родны Край (2015) and Партизан Рок (2015). And check out Железный (2012), Манифест (2008), and Капитал (2007) from Lyapis Trubetskoy (Ляпис Трубецкой), the band Brutto emerged from.

item.title: Russian Smoking Songs and Cigarette Music
item.description: And also about not smoking, but that’s only at the end. Pack of Cigarettes: Пачка сигарет From Kino ’s Viktor Tsoj ( Виктор Цой ), the first big hit for Russian smoking songs. From 1989, from Звезда по имени Солнце (Star Named Sun).

item.title: Russian Corona Song
item.description: Virusnaya In Russia, they took a different approach. At least, that’s what Semjon Slepakov (Семен Слепаков) and Dzhavid Kurbanov (Джавид Курбанов) did, with Вирусная. Clip below – watch and listen. Be sure to check out Russian lesson with a Corona song on Russia in Words and Pictures, about Semjon and the k**-virus.
